Power Fire Zealot:

The power of fire collected at the Source of Fire is only used for the master.

Those who dare to covet the power of fire will not be forgiven.

Light the Sacred Fire! Collect of the source of the First Fire! It's the master's order!


- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -


* The Sacred Fire Summon Scroll can be exchanged at the Conquest Shop in the Conquest UI, and you can light 3 Sacred Fires at once. You can check the status of your Sacred Fire by clicking the Sacred Fire UI in the Conquest stats enchancement UI.

* If you succeed in stealing the Sacred Fire summoned by another server member, you have a chance to obtain the Divine Fire. Each attempt to steal costs a certain amount, and if you fail, you get nothing.

* Compensation is automatically given when the Sacred Fire is extinguished due to success/failure, but if the inventory quantity and weight are over 90%, the reward will not be given and the Sacred fire will be extinguished.
